module.pgpcrypto.control

Class PGPCryptoEngine

  • java.lang.Object
    • module.pgpcrypto.control.PGPCryptoEngine

  • public class PGPCryptoEngine
extends java.lang.Object
    Cryptographic engine to manage encryption and decryption.

    TODO: Add documentation on the container binary format (take picture from thesis).

    Author:
    Stefan Werner

        logConnector - the log connector
        prosumerConnector - the prosumer connector

        Parameters:
        path - the path
        Returns:
        true, if successful

      • decrypt

        java.io.InputStream decrypt(java.io.InputStream encryptedSourceIn,
                            CryptoActionInfo info)
        Decrypts an input stream
        Parameters:
        encryptedSourceIn - the encrypted source input stream
        info - the object to store info (like key ID)
        Returns:
        the decrypted input stream

      • decryptElementName

        java.lang.String decryptElementName(java.io.InputStream encryptedSourceIn)
        Decrypts an element name.
        Parameters:
        encryptedSourceIn - the encrypted source input stream
        Returns:
        the decrypted name

      • decryptHeader

        private java.io.InputStream decryptHeader(java.io.InputStream encryptedDataStream,
                                          CryptoActionInfo info,
                                          boolean getContentStream)
                                   throws DataContainerException,
                                          java.io.IOException,
                                          GpgCryptoException,
                                          org.bouncycastle.openpgp.PGPException
        Decrypts an element header.
        Parameters:
        encryptedDataStream - the encrypted data stream
        info - the object to store info (like key ID)
        getContentStream - true to also get the (decrypted input stream), not necessary if only the name is decrypted
        Returns:
        the input stream (may be null)
        Throws:
        DataContainerException - if a problem with the encryption/decryption occurred
        java.io.IOException - if an I/O exception has occurred
        GpgCryptoException - if a problem with the encryption/decryption occurred
        org.bouncycastle.openpgp.PGPException - if a problem within the PGP subsystem occurred

      • destroy

        void destroy()
        Destroys the key manager (cleans up, removes keys).

      • encrypt

        java.io.OutputStream encrypt(java.io.OutputStream encryptedDestinationOut,
                             java.lang.String[] decryptedPath)
        Encrypts an output stream.
        Parameters:
        encryptedDestinationOut - the output stream to write encrypted data to
        decryptedPath - the decrypted path
        Returns:
        the output stream

      • encryptElementName

        boolean encryptElementName(java.io.OutputStream encryptedDestinationOut,
                           java.lang.String[] decryptedPath)
        Encrypts an element name. Used for folders where we need to write a independent container file.
        Parameters:
        encryptedDestinationOut - the output stream to write encrypted data (element name) to
        decryptedPath - the decrypted path
        Returns:
        true, if successful

      • encryptHeader

        private boolean encryptHeader(java.lang.String[] decryptedPath,
                              java.io.OutputStream dataStream,
                              byte[] randomKey,
                              byte[] randomIv)
                       throws DataContainerException,
                              java.io.IOException,
                              org.bouncycastle.openpgp.PGPException
        Encrypts an element header.
        Parameters:
        decryptedPath - the decrypted path
        dataStream - the output stream to write encrypted data to
        randomKey - the random key
        randomIv - the random iv
        Returns:
        true, if successful
        Throws:
        DataContainerException - if a problem with the encryption/decryption occurred
        java.io.IOException - if an I/O exception has occurred
        org.bouncycastle.openpgp.PGPException - if a problem within the PGP subsystem occurred

        Returns:
